Drinks.Name: Master Chief

ingredients.Name: Concentrated Blue and Orange colored flavors and Mango Pure (Orange and Blue Mio)

recipe: Pour 2 parts Midori over ice in a hefty lowball glass.
In a shaker mix Jack, Jager, a slapsh of Midore, small squeeze blue flavor (Mio) and a dash of Mango Puree.
Lightly add Lemon lime soda to top of glass and finish witha squeeze of orange flavoring (Mio).
Drinks.description: Soldiers aren't machines they're just people. So lighten up and have a drink! Welcome home.
